author: kfogel
msg: Filter out capabilities the server doesn't care about (and, by
extension, capabilities that hook scripts should not care about).
(create_hooks): Adjust wording of start-commit template accordingly.

author: kfogel
msg: (svn_client_blame4): Remove unused 'err' variable, following up to r27653.

author: hwright
msg: Fix issue #2363: Runtime configuration parser code should gracefully
(main): Instead of fatally erroring out, just print a warning if we can't

author: hwright
msg: Fix issue #2964:  Move libsvn_client/blame.c's get-file-revs fallback code into
libsvn_ra/compat.c.  This also  generalizes the implementation of the fallback
for other potential consumers of get-file-revs.
(prev_log_path): Remove note about duplication in libsvn_client.
(svn_client_blame4): Remove fallback to previous versions of get_file_revs().

msg: (no_mergeinfo_from_no_op_merge): Correct comment about expected results of
